name: $adidas Originals: Into the Metaverse
description:
##Into the Metaverse becomes [ALTS by adidas](https://opensea.io/collection/alts-by-adidas). To evolve to this new chapter, [burn your ITM Phase 1 or Phase 2 NFT now](https://collect.adidas.com).

Phase 1 NFT physical product claims have closed. There is no further utility planned for Phase 1 and Phase 2 NFTs. [Burn to ALTS by adidas now](https://collect.adidas.com) for future utility.

 ---

Bored Ape Yacht Club, PUNKS Comic, and gmoney welcome adidas Originals into the Metaverse.
